summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of CT Fidelis landing page. All major features working correctly including carousel auto-scroll, ETHNOCENTRIC font, WhatsApp icons, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: ETHNOCENTRIC font applied to all h1, h2, h3 titles (7 titles confirmed)
Carousel manual navigation (prev/next buttons and dot indicators)
WhatsApp icons visible in navbar, hero CTA, main CTA, and footer
Footer social icons and contact information
Responsive font sizing on mobile (30px for hero title)
WhatsApp floating button visibility and functionality
